newsitem.title: CHINA: China Jan-July crude oil imports up 56 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: China Jan-July crude oil imports up 56 pct yr/yr.

text.p: China's crude oil exports in the first seven months reached 10.17 million tonnes, down 1.5 percent from the same year-ago period, customs figures showed on Wednesday.
Exports in July alone were 1.66 million tonnes.
China imported 12.42 million tonnes of crude oil in the first seven months, up 56.2 percent from the year-ago period, the figures showed.
Crude oil imports in July alone were 1.56 million tonnes.

The country's imports of refined oil products reached 8.6 million tonnes in the first seven months, up 18.3 percent from the year-ago period, customs figures showed. Imports in July alone were 1.72 million tonnes.
China's exports of refined oil products reached 1.92 million tonnes in the first seven months, down 15.6 percent compared with the same year-ago period, the figures showed.
Exports in July alone were 240,000 tonnes.
There were no comparative figures for July data.
